parameters.name: Standard
parameters.description: Thread standard as defined by swCosmeticStandardType_e

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Thread size for the specified Standard

parameters.name: EndType
parameters.description: End condition as defined by swCosmeticEndConditions_e

parameters.name: Depth
parameters.description: Depth of the cosmetic thread; valid only for EndType = swCosmeticEndConditions_e.swEndConditionBlind or swCosmeticEndConditions_e.swEndConditionBlindUptoNext or swCosmeticEndConditions_e.swEndConditionBlind2Dia

parameters.name: Note
parameters.description: Callout text to display in the drawing document
